channel.title: CVE Feed for Grafana -- Agent Flow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grafana -- Agent Flow

item.title: CVE-2024-8996|2024-09-25T17:39:36.592Z -- grafana -- agent%20flow
item.description: Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in Grafana Agent (Flow mode) on Windows allows Privilege Escalation from Local User to SYSTEM This issue affects Agent Flow: before 0.43.2
